dataPoints.rawContent: The German Bundestag today passed a new law aimed at accelerating the visa process for skilled workers, with officials hoping to reduce average processing times by up to 25% starting next quarter.
The German Bundestag today passed a new law aimed at accelerating the visa process for skilled workers, with officials hoping to reduce average processing times by up to 25% starting next quarter.

proposal.reason: Email confirmation with a tracking number indicates the I-20 will be received tomorrow, completing this step 10 days ahead of schedule.
